text:
(Translated by Google) Pub where you can have a good beer. It is located near Leicester Square and Piccadily Circus.

(Original)
Pub , gdzie można napić się dobrego piwa . Znajduje się niedaleko Leicester Square i Piccadily Circus .
Nice place for drinks. John the bartender served some killer espresso martinis.
Always great beer and wine and love the live music on Sunday's
Good selection of ales, though typical theatre land, central London prices!
Alas poor Blue Posts I knew it well. RIP
Brilliant pub great team behind the bar a must visit when in Soho.
Tiny & cramped but feels like it's part of its charm. Good selection of beers, not sure I could stay for more than a couple of drinks though due to how crowded it gets
Friendly staff and a good range of beers on tap.
Really nice pub, with a cocktail bar upstairs (didn't manage to get into the cocktail bar because it was full). Staff were friendly and it wasn't particularly rowdy which was good
Everyone friendly but waiting an hour for cold veg, mash and gravy spoiled it.
